snippet: The enthusiastic amateurs, Christian conservatives and Tea Party activists supporting Chris McDaniel stand in contrast to his rival Senator Thad Cochran’s establishment backing.
abstract: Upcoming runoff election following primary between incumbent Sen Thad Cochran of Mississippi and Tea Party upstart Chris McDaniel embodies deep cultural rifts among conservative voters; bizarre race has had several controversial incidents, including accusations surrounding group of McDaniel supporters who locked themselves in a courthouse on night of primary to 'monitor' vote count.

byline.contributor: Alan Blinder contributed reporting from Atlanta.

lead_paragraph: The enthusiastic amateurs, Christian conservatives and Tea Party activists supporting Chris McDaniel stand in contrast to his rival Senator Thad Cochran’s establishment backing.

headline.seo: Chris McDaniel’s Enthusiastic Amateurs vs. Thad Cochran’s Establishment Backers
headline.main: Senate Race in Mississippi Exposes a Cultural Rift
headline.print_headline: Senate Race in Mississippi Exposes a Cultural Rift
